lead_paragraph: Libya’s new unity government, which was formed in December, has struggled to enforce its authority, which rival factions refuse to acknowledge.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Imposes Sanctions on Politician in Libya
headline.main: U.S. Penalizes Libyan Politician in Effort to Bolster Unity Government

snippet: Libya’s new unity government, which was formed in December, has struggled to enforce its authority, which rival factions refuse to acknowledge.
abstract: United States imposes sanctions against Libyan politician Khalifa al-Ghweil, leader of self-declared government in Tripoli, as part of effort to force country's competing factions to accept authority of United Nations-backed unity government.
